DOC.brief_title: Acute Clinical Evaluation Multi-purpose Solutions ( MPS ) Soft Contact Lens Wearers
DOC.detailed_description: This study conduct series ten small study three country use commercially available contact lens solution per country , ie , United Kingdom , France , Philippines . In study , participant assess use 5 product ( one always control saline/blister pack solution ) randomize order conjunction one silicone hydrogel contact lenses . A total 278 participant enrol 10 study .
DOC.criteria: Have read , understood , sign , date write Informed Consent . Be adapt successful soft contact lens wearer daily wear basis least two week . Vision correctable least 20/30 Snellen . Other protocoldefined inclusion criterion may apply . Topical ocular medication use . History hypersensitivity component study contact lens care system . Any slitlamp finding abnormal nature baseline visit assessment study period . Pregnant , lactating , plan pregnancy . Other protocoldefined exclusion criterion may apply .
